body.p:
State of Kentucky
McLean Co. } Sct.

I Douglas Little Presiding Judge of McLean County Ky. Do hereby certify that Pierce Butler Hawkins Personally appeared before me And took the following oath To Wit: I Pierce Butler Hawkins do solemnly swear that I will faithfully support the constitution of the United States And the constitution of Kentucky And will discharge all and singular ^the^ duties and services appertaining to the office of Colonel in the Volunteer Militia agreeable to the Law and general regulations and will obey said such orders and instructions as I shall from time to time receive from the proper officers.
Which is hereby certified to general head Quarters
Given under my hand at Calhoon Ky this 23rd day of November 1861

Douglas Little
P. J. McLean County
